channel.title: Networking on Donia Chaiehloudj
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Donia Chaiehloudj

item.title: From Squire to Network Knight: Defending the Kubernetes Castle the Cloud Native Way
item.description: A journey from beginner to expert in Kubernetes network security using Cilium and cloud native tools - from wide-open cluster to layered defense.

item.title: Mastering Hardware Programming, Go, & Networking in Embedded Systems
item.description: Discussing my journey in hardware programming, why Go is a game-changer for embedded development, and tackling networking challenges in IoT.

item.title: Sécurise ton réseau avec la magie d'eBPF
item.description: Comment utiliser eBPF pour sécuriser les réseaux - filtrage, monitoring et protection de l’infrastructure.
